data.title: Python3-pyrle
data.description: Numerical Run Length Encoding and Arithmetic in Cython
data.name: pyrle

evidence: "Run length arithmetic in Python using Cython. Inspired by the Rle class in R's S4Vectors." (indicates a reusable library for run-length encoded arithmetic, i.e., a dependency package)
PyPI badge: "[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/pyrle.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/pyrle)" (shows distribution via the PyPI package registry)
The functionality (run length arithmetic, analogous to R's S4Vectors Rle) is a core data/analysis operation commonly used directly in scientific data processing, indicating direct research execution.
